## Description {#details}

### getCUIndex() {#a168c086b440ac3edbfc53840cae70183}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getCUIndex () const</>}>
Returns the Index into the Compilation Unit list of the owning Name Index or std::nullopt if this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> does not have an associated Compilation Unit.

It is up to the user to verify that the returned Index is valid in the owning <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/nameindex">NameIndex</a> (or use <a href="#a68a2f93ef6b921fa2841f711434b5f30">getCUOffset()</a>, which will handle that check itself). Note that entries in NameIndexes which index just a single Compilation Unit are implicitly associated with that unit, so this function will return 0 even without an explicit DW&#95;IDX&#95;compile&#95;unit attribute, unless there is a DW&#95;IDX&#95;type&#95;unit attribute.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h/#l00464">464</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h">DWARFAcceleratorTable.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp/#l00644">644</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp">DWARFAcceleratorTable.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getCUOffset() {#a68a2f93ef6b921fa2841f711434b5f30}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getCUOffset () const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns the Offset of the Compilation Unit associated with this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> or std::nullopt if the Compilation Unit offset is not recorded in this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a>.

</MemberDefinition>

### getNameIndex() {#a64e58bb460a5ae0a687b1414928c4859}

<MemberDefinition

### getParentDIEEntry() {#a7bdb3e65ba30c7b30437f48960cc9dc6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::optional&lt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry &gt; &gt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getParentDIEEntry () const</>}>
Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> corresponding to the parent of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> represented by <code>this</code> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a>.

If the parent is not in the table, nullopt is returned. Precondition: <a href="#aa52b75e81f83faaff001fdf8f6433144">hasParentInformation()</a> == true. An error is returned for ill-formed tables.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h/#l00494">494</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h">DWARFAcceleratorTable.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp/#l00694">694</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp">DWARFAcceleratorTable.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRelatedCUIndex() {#a135d424639be046fd6d58dbaaa831f82}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getRelatedCUIndex () const</>}>
Similar functionality to <a href="#a168c086b440ac3edbfc53840cae70183">getCUIndex()</a> but without the DW&#95;IDX&#95;type&#95;unit restriction.

This allows us to get the associated a compilation unit index for an entry that is a type unit.

</MemberDefinition>

### getTag() {#ae423031d453f1608b8de2615f501a961}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; dwarf::Tag &gt; llvm::DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getTag () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns the Tag of the Debug Info <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> associated with this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> or std::nullopt if the Tag is not recorded in this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h/#l00448">448</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h">DWARFAcceleratorTable.h</a>.

### getTUIndex() {#aabddaaf3a1568deb8177b99810ee0054}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; DWARFDebugNames::Entry::getTUIndex () const</>}>
Returns the index of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> Unit of the owning Name Index or std::nullopt if this Accelerator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> does not have an associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> Unit.

It is up to the user to verify that the returned Index is a valid index in the owning <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/nameindex">NameIndex</a> (or use <a href="#abc7e4becda80f2307c86bfb95213dece">getLocalTUOffset()</a>, which will handle that check itself).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h/#l00477">477</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h">DWARFAcceleratorTable.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp/#l00687">687</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-cpp">DWARFAcceleratorTable.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Returns true if this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdebugnames/entry">Entry</a> has information about its parent <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> (i.e.

if it has an IDX&#95;parent attribute)

### lookup() {#aaf26e5048ffe1347a66cf21a0b4b6591}
